file_content.text: Torrun has hidden the mask away. I would be angry, but at least it's with us now.
You must continue on your path without me.
Ah! You've returned. You must have talked to Torrun by now--did you make it out to the estate?
Did you--did you see the mask? Wasn't it amazing?
I have the mask right here.
See for yourself. [Give mask]
Oh, you have it! I never thought I'd see it again.
Free from Grathan's prison at last... free from the hands of heretics. It's a wonderful day.
My trial is complete. The mask is yours now.
Go on, take it.
I live to serve, Ladra.
I wish I'd been there, cutting Grathan's apprentices to pieces again and again... but it was your trial. Your privilege.
You're fawning over a trinket. It isn't Revan--only a mask.
It's just a silly mask.
Oh, poor initiate. You still don't understand... but it's alright. The mask is with us now.
I have a gift for you, to celebrate your success and the completion of the rite.
I can't finish your initiation--only the Master can do that--but I can recognize achievement. You've done so very well. The mask will guide us forevermore.
I don't have the mask yet.
I'm still looking for it.
Oh. Well, don't give up. The mask of Revan has been waiting for its freedom for a long time.
I want that mask, initiate!
You need to talk to Torrun. He'll prepare you to find the mask.
Ah, so good to see another pureblood following the teachings of Darth Revan.
Come, speak with me. Darth Revan appreciated all species of the galaxy, and so do his followers.
Come forward. Speak to me. We're all students of Darth Revan, and I enjoy the company of initiates.
I remember when I was like you. I remember my trials and the joy of killing in the Master's name. You're so fortunate.
How often does the Master ask that someone be killed?
The Master demands death?
The Master doesn't have to ask. He trusts me with that burden of judgment.
How true.
Good! Even if you fail your tests, feel lucky to have participated.
I don't need a cult leader to tell me when or whom to kill.
I kill in my own name.
Neither did I. But you'll find that killing as a Revanite is more fulfilling.
I'm Ladra. Once the personal assassin of a Sith Lord, I am now the serene protector of the Master and his students.
I contemplate Revan's teachings as I execute intruders and heretics. But I also guide initiates and help determine their trials.
Your wisdom must be great, Ladra. Will you share it?
Will you guide me?
Of course I will. That is how I honor the Master.
You do excellent work.
Thank you. Your praise is kind, but unneeded. Helping you join us will be reward enough.
How did a disturbed woman like you acquire so much power?
The blind leading the blind.
Disturbed? I'm the product of Darth Revan's teachings and the Master's instruction. My mind is clear, as yours will soon be.
Every Revanite's initiation includes a trial of the past--a rite to bind the initiate to Revan. Your rite will be very special.
You will find the mask of Darth Revan--what he wore after becoming Sith. It's a powerful symbol of his greatness, long lost to us.
My talents lie in destruction, not relic-hunting.
I'd prefer an enemy to fight.
There's to be destruction, too. I can promise that.
Retrieving forgotten lore is my specialty.
A lost relic? Exciting.
Whatever I must do to prove myself, Ladra.
I will find this for you.
That's the proper spirit. Excellent.
I'm always looking for a job.
As you wish.
Then I'm glad to put your skills to use.
I have to do this to meet the Master?
Is this necessary?
Of course. The Master doesn't waste time with students. You must complete your initiation!
What a useless ritual.
Don't talk like that. The mask represents Revan's supreme essence. Besides, if you don't complete your initiation, you'll have to die.
The mask is in a collection of antiquities possessed by my former teacher, the Sith Lord Grathan.
It must be freed from that heretic. Rescued in a rain of blood and death!
Stealing from a Sith Lord won't be easy to survive.
I may be the one dying.
Revan faced death to achieve greatness--as will you.
You seem awfully obsessed.
I'll give it a place of honor here in the compound, of course, so every Revanite can see it.
Blood and death--perfect.
Speak to Torrun, our curator. He'll give you the spiritual guidance you need and tell you where the mask is.
When your journey's done, bring the mask to me. Good luck. Welcome the peace that comes with serving the Master.
You should not be here! Turn away, or you'll regret your intrusion.
